    • Uses of Internal in com.doa.engine.input

      Fields in com.doa.engine.input with annotations of type Internal 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static KeyAdapter DoaKeyboard.INPUT
      This construct ensures all key events in any logical frame to be captured and saved in this class' internal state.
      static MouseInputAdapter DoaMouse.INPUT
      This construct ensures all mouse events in any logical frame to be captured and saved in this class' internal state.
      Methods in com.doa.engine.input with annotations of type Internal 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void DoaKeyboard.tick()
      This method is required to be public, but should never be called explicitly by any class at any time except DoaEngine.
      static void DoaMouse.tick()
      This method is required to be public, but should never be called explicitly by any class at any time except DoaEngine.
